Add the nth segment

add_nth_segment.Rd

Add the nth segment

Usage

add_nth_segment(n, ij, xy, wt = 1, lamp = 1, clr = "#CCCCCC")

Arguments

n

an index for

ij

the indices of the arrows to plot

xy

the xy locations

wt

the line weight

lamp

arrow width scaling factor

clr

the arrow color

Value

invisible(NULL)
